text: Welcome to Hard Times is a 1967 American western movie. It was directed by Burt Kennedy. The movie was based on the book with the same name by E. L. Doctorow. Actors include Henry Fonda, Warren Oates, Janis Paige, Keenan Wynn, Lon Chaney Jr., Aldo Ray, and Janice Rule. It was distributed by Metro- Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * Category:1967 movies Category:1960s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Burt Kennedy
title: Welcome to Hard Times
